attributes.action: Consider paying working mothers to give up work an amount in benefits in alignment with years worked.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mothers are often forced to return to work after having children because the cost of living is just too high for one wage. I feel they should be given the opportunity to raise their own children by increasing their benefit payments in alignment to the number of years worked and taxes paid. For example,
5 years worked = 40% of final salary, 10 years = 60%
15 years = 80%
20 years = 100%
This would not only make many women very happy, it would also make thousands of jobs available to those who are currently unemployed and children would definately benefit from having a parent at home - this may even help to cut down on crime. Also please consider allowing them to continue to pay into any company pension scheme.
